data.message: Hi 👋 is it true that Mark the Director of Facebook.he is warning everyone using Facebook will cost money starting tomorrow.if we don't start sending to 18 different people on our list it said your icon will turn blue it will be free .if we don't believe him by tomorrow 6pm Facebook will close and to open we will have to pay .this is all by law he said .he said this is congested . Tomorrow they will start collect the messages for Facebook at 0.37 cents is this true will we have to pay for messages on Facebook we all need to know thank you 😊

replies.message: Thanks for the question, JoAnn. Facebook is free and always will be. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Stephanie
